# timestamp

**Instance Property**

The date and time of the signature’s creation in milliseconds, formatted in Unix epoch time.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var timestamp: NSNumber { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentDiscount/timestamp] keeps the payment discount active for 24 hours.

## Validating the Discount

- **nonce**: A universally unique ID (UUID) value that you define.
- **signature**: A string representing the properties of a specific promotional offer, cryptographically signed.
